CommandDefinition.Name: copycronlikeorders
CommandDefinition.Description: Copies all (or some) Cron Like Orders from one application version to another.

Argument.Name: sourceVersion
Argument.Description: The version from which all Cron Like Orders will be copied

Argument.Name: targetVersion
Argument.Description: The version to which all Cron Like Orders will be copied

Argument.Name: id
Argument.Description: Id of Cron Like Order to be copied. Other Cron Like Orders will be ignored.

Argument.Name: ordertype
Argument.Description: Ordertype(s) of Cron Like Orders to be copied. Other Cron Like Orders will be ignored.

BoolOption.Name: m
BoolOption.Description: Remove copied Cron Like Orders in source version (default = false).

BoolOption.Name: g
BoolOption.Description: Copy Cron Like Orders belonging to the other cluster node as well.
